documents.document: Hearing That Old Rugged Cross still gives me chills. Every time

@_AmberWinkelman sorry that's *3 dogs. And yes. They were brought on the lifeboats. That didn't have enough room for the people on board
I just learned 2 dogs were saved from the titanic. Can u imagine being in the water dying & some high class broad has her dog on a life boat
